trans-unit.source: A detached ruleset can use all variables and mixins accessible where it is defined and where it is called. Otherwise said, both definition and caller scopes are available to it. If both scopes contains the same variable or mixin, declaration scope value takes precedence.

trans-unit.source: A detached ruleset is a group of css properties, nested rulesets, media declarations or anything else stored in a variable. You can include it into a ruleset or another structure and all its properties are going to be copied there. You can also use it as a mixin argument and pass it around as any other variable.

An operation on colors always produces valid color. If some color dimension of the result ends up being bigger than ff or smaller than 00, the dimension is rounded to either ff or 00. If alpha ends up being bigger than 1.0 or smaller than 0.0, the alpha is rounded to either 1.0 or 0.0.

trans-unit.source: Arithmetical operations +, -, *, / can operate on any number, color or variable. If it is possible, mathematical operations take units into account and convert numbers before adding, subtracting or comparing them. The result has leftmost explicitly stated unit type. If the conversion is impossible or not meaningful, units are ignored. Example of impossible conversion: px to cm or rad to %.
trans-unit.target: 算术运算 + ， - ， * ， / 可以对任何数字，颜色或变量进行运算。如果可能，数学运算会在加，减或比较它们之前考虑单位并转换数字。结果具有最左侧明确说明的单位类型。如果转换是不可能的或没有意义，则将忽略单位。不可能的转换示例：px转换为cm或rad转换为％。

trans-unit.source: As an extension to CSS, Less is not only backwards compatible with CSS, but the extra features it adds use existing CSS syntax. This makes learning Less a breeze, and if in doubt, lets you fall back to vanilla CSS.

trans-unit.source: Color operations generally take parameters in the same units as the values they are changing, and percentages are handled as absolutes, so increasing a 10% value by 10% results in 20%. Set the option method parameter to relative for relative percentages. When using relative percentages increasing a 10% value by 10% results in 11%. Values are clamped to their allowed ranges; they do not wrap around. Where return values are shown, we've used formats that make it clear what each function has done, in addition to the hex versions that you will usually be be working with.
trans-unit.target: 颜色操作一般取参数的单位与所要改变的数值相同,而百分比是作为绝对值处理的,所以将10%的数值增加10%,结果是20%。对于相对百分比,将选项方法参数设置为相对。当使用相对百分比时,将10%的值增加10%的结果是11%。数值被限制在其允许的范围内,它们不会环绕。在显示返回值的地方,我们使用了格式,除了你通常使用的十六进制版本外,还清楚地显示了每个函数所做的工作。

trans-unit.source: Colors are split into their red, green, blue and alpha dimensions. The operation is applied to each color dimension separately. E.g., if the user added two colors, then the green dimension of the result is equal to sum of green dimensions of input colors. If the user multiplied a color by a number, each color dimension will get multiplied.
trans-unit.target: 颜色被分割成红、绿、蓝和阿尔法四个维度。操作分别应用于每个颜色维度。例如,如果用户添加了两种颜色,那么结果的绿色维度等于输入颜色的绿色维度之和。如果用户将一种颜色乘以一个数字,那么每个颜色维度都会被相乘。

trans-unit.source: Combines the effects of both multiply and screen. Conditionally make light channels lighter and dark channels darker. Note: The results of the conditions are determined by the first color parameter.

trans-unit.source: Extend by default looks for exact match between selectors. It does matter whether selector uses leading star or not. trans-unit.source: Mixins copy all of the properties into a selector, which can lead to unnecessary duplication. Therefore you can use extends instead of mixins to move the selector up to the properties you wish to use, which leads to less CSS being generated.

trans-unit.source: You can use ... if you want your mixin to take a variable number of arguments. Using this after a variable name will assign those arguments to the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望mixin接受可变数量的参数，则可以使用 ... 。在变量名之后使用此命令会将这些参数分配给变量。

trans-unit.source: You can use logical operators with guards. The syntax is based on CSS media queries.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用带有防护的逻辑运算符。语法是基于CSS媒体查询的。

trans-unit.source: You don't have to use @value, @key, and @index in your each() function. In Less 3.7, with the each() function, Less is introducing the concept of anonymous mixins, which may expand to other parts of the syntax at a later date.
You may have noticed that there are available globals for your plugin file, namely a function registry (functions object), and the less object. These are there for convenience.

You will use this when a CSS file may not be Less compatible; this is because although Less supports most known standards CSS, it does not support comments in some places and does not support all known CSS hacks without modifying the CSS.
trans-unit.target: 当一个CSS文件可能与Less不兼容时,你会使用这个功能;这是因为尽管Less支持大多数已知的标准CSS,但它在某些地方不支持注释,并且在不修改CSS的情况下不支持所有已知的CSS黑客。

trans-unit.source: and again both > and whitespace are optional
trans-unit.target: 同样， > 和空格都是可选的

trans-unit.target: 并在目标选择器中使用变量进行扩展,结果一无所获。

相当于--参数中的颜色停止。
